intro: Brimeura amethystina f. font-queri, commonly known as the Font-Queri form of the amethystina brimeura, is a rare and distinctive variant of the brimeura genus. It is characterized by its unique floral morphology, featuring a striking violet hue that sets it apart from other members of the species. The plant exhibits a compact growth habit with dense, overlapping leaves that contribute to its ornamental appeal. It thrives in specific microhabitats, typically in shaded, moist environments with well-drained soil. Due to its rarity and unique botanical features, it is of interest to botanists and horticulturists alike.
